scripts.build: webpack -d && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/service-worker.js dist/service-worker.js && cp src/firebase-messaging-sw.js dist/firebase-messaging-sw.js && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && webpack-dev-server --content-base dist/ --inline --hot
scripts.build:prod: webpack -p && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/service-worker.js dist/service-worker.js && cp src/firebase-messaging-sw.js dist/firebase-messaging-sw.js && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json
